I look forward to chatting tomorrow.

On 
Wed, Oct 28, 2020 at 6:48 PM wrote: 
Thanks very much -- 3:30 p.m. tomorrow would be great, if that works for you, and if ou're able to send 
those materials that would be helpful. We can use the following conference line: , passcode 
Thanks, 
From: Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco â€¢

Best, 
EFTA00018629

Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 28, 2020, at 1:17 PM, Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco < 
> 
wrote: 
Hi M, 
Yes, I  have some time to chat this week. I have availability today or Friday before noon or after 3:00pm. 
I can be reached on my cell 
Best, 
Kim 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Oct 28, 2020, at 1:10 PM, 
Dr. 
Mehlman-Orozco, 
or feel free to circulate a call-in number. 
> wrote: 
My colleagues, and , and I are the prosecutors in the case of United States 
v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 2020 in the Southern District of New 
York. We would be interested in speaking with you about your availability to testify at trial. Are you 
available for a call this week to discuss? 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00018630

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New 
York 
Dr. Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco 
www.mehlmanorozco.com
